price: Quand on cite l’exemple du fils de Marie, ton peuple s’en détourne ,
arabic: ۞ وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوۡمُكَ مِنۡهُ يَصِدُّونَ
footnotes: [845] S’en détourne: autre sens, s’en réjouit.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walammā ḍuriba ub'nu maryama mathalan idhā qawmuka min'hu yaṣiddūna
